verses.verse: Set the trumpet <WH7782> to your mouth <WH2441>. He shall come as a eagle <WH5404> against the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068>, because they have transgressed <WH5674> my covenant <WH1285>, and trespassed <WH6586> against my law <WH8451>.
Israel <WH3478> shall cry <WH2199> unto me <WH430>, My God, we know you <WH3045>.
Israel <WH3478> has cast off <WH2186> the thing that is good <WH2896>: the enemy <WH341> shall pursue him <WH7291>.

They have set up kings <WH4427>, but not by me <WH7786>: they have made princes, and I knew <WH3045> it not <WH3701>: of their silver and their gold <WH2091> have they made <WH6213> them idols <WH6091>, that they may be cut off <WH3772>.
Your calf <WH5695>, O Samaria <WH8111>, has cast <WH2186> you off <WH639>; my anger is kindled <WH2734> against them <WH3808>: how long will it be before they attain <WH3201> to innocence <WH5356>?
For from Israel <WH3478> was it also <WH2796>: the workman made <WH6213> it <WH430>; therefore it is not God: but the calf <WH5695> of Samaria <WH8111> shall be broken in pieces <WH7616>.

For they have sown <WH2232> the wind <WH7307>, and they shall reap <WH7114> the whirlwind <WH5492>: it has no stalk <WH7054>: the bud <WH6780> shall yield <WH6213> no meal <WH7058>: if <WH194> so be it yield <WH6213>, the strangers <WH2114> shall swallow it up <WH1104>.
Israel <WH3478> is swallowed up <WH1104>: now shall they be among the Nations <WH1471> as a vessel <WH3627> where is no pleasure <WH2656>.
For they are gone up <WH5927> to Assyria <WH804>, a wild donkey <WH6501> alone <WH909> by himself <WH669>: Ephraim has hired <WH8566> lovers <WH158>.

Yes <WH8566>, though they have hired among the nations <WH1471>, now will I gather <WH6908> them <WH2490>, and they shall sorrow a little <WH4592> for the burden <WH4853> of the king <WH4428> of princes <WH8269>.
Because Ephraim <WH669> has made many <WH7235> altars <WH4196> to sin <WH2398>, altars <WH4196> shall be unto him to sin <WH2398>.
I have written <WH3789> to him the great things <WH7230> of my law <WH8451>, but they were counted <WH2803> as a strange thing <WH2114>.

They sacrifice <WH2076> flesh <WH1320> for the sacrifices <WH2077> of my offerings <WH1890>, and eat <WH398> it <WH3068>; but the Lord accepts <WH7521> them not <WH2142>; now will he remember their iniquity <WH5771>, and visit <WH6485> their sins <WH2403>: they shall return <WH7725> to Egypt <WH4714>.

For Israel <WH3478> has forgotten <WH7911> his Maker <WH6213>, and builds <WH1129> temples <WH1964>; and Judah <WH3063> has multiplied <WH7235> fenced <WH1219> cities <WH5892>: but I will send <WH7971> a fire <WH784> upon his cities <WH5892>, and it shall devour <WH398> the palaces there <WH759>.
